mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CARD (ID, MEMBER_ID, CARD_NUMBER, CARD_EXPIRE_DATE, CARD_PASSWORD) VALUES(SEQ_CARD.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{cardNumber}, #{cardBirthDate}, #{cardPassword})
mapper.select: SELECT CARD_NUMBER, CARD_EXPIRE_DATE, MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_CARD C ON MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND M.ID = C.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY ID DESC
